data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Intimation of Closure of Trading Window of Lenskart Solutions Limited from Monday November 10 2025 and will remain closed till 48 hours after the declaration of the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half-year ended Sepptember 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Lenskart Solutions Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 10 2025 the Equity Shares of Lenskart Solutions Ltd (Scrip Code: 544600) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251107-66 dated November 07 2025.
